mainText:
I feel the need to express my condolences. I am 17, and growing up  
watching every Keynote presentation by the man in the black turtleneck  
was foundational to me. His vision has done the better part of  
defining the Millennial's lifestyle, and I'm proud to say I am heavily  
influenced by Apple. Everything about the company has inspired my  
philosophy on technology, and guaranteed Steve Jobs' methods will  
continue to be a driving force for me until, and beyond the day when  
I start my first company.
author: Ocean
